metadata.title: Nanoparticulate apatite and greenalite in oldest, well-preserved hydrothermal vent precipitates

authors_verbatim: Rasmussen B.; Muhling J. R.; Tosca N. J.

acknowledgement.exact_text:
Acknowledgments: 
SEM, Raman spectroscopy, FIB, and TEM analyses were performed at the Centre for Microscopy, Characterisation and Analysis (CMCA) at the University of Western Australia (UWA), a node of Microscopy Australia funded by NCRIS, university, and state government sources. 
We thank A. Suvorova, S. Gain, and M. Saunders for technical support and B. Krapez for comments. We acknowledge the University of Western Australia Geology
Museum and the Western Australian Museum for access to samples.
